algorithm_technique: Character mapping and checking for full alphabet usage.
problem_summary_simple: Can one string be transformed into another by changing all occurrences of a character?
problem_summary_technical: Checks if a one-to-one character mapping exists from str1 to str2, with a special case for the full alphabet.
key_insights: A character in str1 can only map to one character in str2.
If all 26 characters are used in str2, transformation is impossible unless str1 equals str2.
